text: Mai Mala Buni (born 11 November 1967), Nigeria) is a Nigerian politician. He is the current governor of Yobe State, Nigeria and the caretaker chairman of the All Progressives Congress. He was elected governor during the 2019 Nigeria general elections under All Progressives Congress (APC) party. Before being elected governor, he was the national secretary of the All Progressives Congress. == References == Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:People from Yobe State Category:All Progressives Congress politicians
title: Mai Mala Buni
